namaskarâ€¦jai maharashtraâ€¦mera kavita ka sirshak hain local train ka bhikhari. ek haat mein pakdi hain harmonium ki peti, dusre haat se pakde hain apni beti, gaata hain wo pardesi pardesi jana nahi, lagta hain wo shor hain, gana nahi.
very observant mahesh. is original gaane ka bhi yehi point hainâ€¦shorâ€¦.continue mahesh
mang rahe hain wo 10 paise 10 paise, kya bhul likhi hain kavita humaari? lekin janab janab mein batana bhool hi gaya ye tha local train ka bhikhari!
wonderful wonderful surprise ending wasn't it?
yeah it was veryâ€¦shall i tell it like hichcock, a twist in the tale.
humaari agli avitri hai gopi vetha

sahil, aurtein bhans hi to hain
nahi marad saand hoote hain

lekin phir bhi main deekhta hoon kyu, sadial si aise haar movie! deekhna cahiye ghar ke living room mein byathkar byass remote waala tv
daddyji!
indravardhan, tumne aapne kavita ke zariye zindagi jeene ka raaz batayiâ€¦.i...mainâ€¦mainâ€¦main to ro padaâ€¦..
par abhi kuuch baaki hainâ€¦
par this was the best maya!
so farâ€¦so farâ€¦let's hear rosesh's poem?
butâ€¦he was the best! i'm sorryâ€¦please excuse me for my tears!
and now the immensly talented rosesh sarabhai
i'm sorryâ€¦all the best!
thank you!
but indravardhanâ€¦

main jo kavita padhonga uska title hain jellyâ€¦..lagul lagul lagul lagul, laal laal lagul lagul, jelly. jelly ke kaise sareer mein chupein hain dancer jaise unjaane, unkahein peheli, jelly meri momma ka banaya, narm mulayam, meethaâ€¦pasand karein isse har koi, sangeeta, rita, nita, anita,....
vintage rosesh mayaâ€¦.main kya kahu? mere paas shabd nahi hain kehena ka rosesh!
mere paas tamatar!
jelly giray jameen par, awaaw aayein, ploop ploop ploop,
come again, come again, come againâ€¦
jelly girain zameen par to awaz aayein, ploop ploop. baccha usse haat maarein, sunayi deti hainâ€¦thup thup
he's playing on the onomatopoeia! ha ha
jelly par kabhi fungus naa lagein, uska swaard kabhi bhankas na lagein, agar bachaana hain humaare humaari country, to banana hain jelly ko desh ki pradhanmantri!
mera betaâ€¦mera bacchaâ€¦sensational rosesh! rosesh ki kavita kavita nahi hain, wo ek andolan hainâ€¦it's a revolution!
but, what is the verdict?

maya, rosesh ka kavita mein geherayi hain, philosophy hain, lekin indravardhan ke kavita mein sachayi hainâ€¦can we have indravardha over here please? mere bada betaâ€¦.mera bada bacchaâ€¦agar indravardhan humaara bartaman hain to rosesh humaara bhabishaâ€¦..to award ka baatein bhool jao maya aur ye socho ki bartamaan aur bhabishya milke kavita likhein to kya hooga
mar gaye!
bhurbhur bhurbhur ugalta paani, paani mein uglein chawal ki jawaani!
jawan hookar chawal sajayeenge thaali, lagayenge daal kaali kaali.
bhoopu bhoopu aaya dekho, idliwala raju pardeshi,
kaale bade cehere par daant bade aur aankhein zaara si.
roshni agar na ho aur raju khada ho saath
nazar mein ayenge srif uske chaar chamaktein daantâ€¦sahil sun na
sun raha hoon. dekha iska nateejaâ€¦.iska combination?
oye, itne bhi buuri nahi hain!
boori nahin hain! saabzi kiski bana rahi hain/
sabzi kuuch bhi banaya nahiâ€¦kya banayu/
kacche kele ki banao
kavi hain do rosesh aur induâ€¦
